Interface TextStyle

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, NamedStyle, Style
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultTextStyle
public interface TextStyle
extends NamedStyle, java.lang.Cloneable

A text style definition.

3.1, 08/2004

paint

void paint(java.awt.Graphics2D g,
           float x,
           float y,
           java.lang.String text)
Paints a text line of the defined style. Entities should use this method to paint text, instead of trying to do it any other way.

Parameters:
g - the graphics context to paint the text line to
x - X-coodrinate of the text
y - Y-coodrinate of the text
text - string to display

paint

void paint(java.awt.Graphics2D g,
           float x,
           float y,
           java.lang.String text,
           float size)
Paints a text line of the defined style. Entities should use this method to paint text, instead of trying to do it any other way.

Parameters:
g - the graphics context to paint the text line to
x - X-coodrinate of the text
y - Y-coodrinate of the text
text - string to display
size - size of the text to draw, as in model space

clone

java.lang.Object clone()
Creates a copy of the style.

Returns:
a copy of this style
